front.title: Swoop Mercenary
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots or drives and, when driving a swoop, adds 3 to landspeed. When present at a site with another Swoop Mercenary, may draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.
front.lore: Members of swoop gangs on Tatooine often have experience piloting larger craft. Many wear tall shock-helmets.
